subject: Improve console language support
description:
Console can't print game messages in anything but English; whenever one is logged in there in different language, it looks like random gibberish, letters mixed with numbers and symbools ("D03/5!00:4N"). Thus as more languages are added to the game, players won't know what's the console saying after it prints some important events during the match (death messages, announcements) - these are translatable.

Tested: Legacy 2.76 compiled September 20, 2018 (thanks to ryven)
